001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base;

003/**
004 * Marker interface for fluent service classes.
005 *
006 * <p>Classes implementing this interface are recognized as fluent services within the framework
007 * and can be dynamically managed during test execution.
008 *
009 * <p>Implementing this interface does not require defining any methods; its presence
010 * is used solely for identification and service discovery.
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
013 */
014public interface ClassLevelHook {
015
016}
